metadata.title: CVE-2024-22362 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Drupal contains a vulnerability with improper handling of structuralelements. If this vulnerability is exploited, an attacker may be able tocause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
